6/ Because of high inertia & overhead, political systems are vulnerable to erosion by robust, adaptable crypto-based operating systems.
5/ What takes 4 generations in politics may take only 4 years in cryptocurrency. Pursuit of utopia always fails, but much faster in crypto.
4/ Because of the low exit friction and free market competition, cryptocurrency experiments fail fast. # CreativeDestruction.
2/ Political systems: geographically enforced, w_ high exit friction Cryptocurrency systems: contractually enforced, w_ low exit friction
1/ Political systems are broad social operating systems Cryptocurrencies are narrow social operating systems
